channel.description: Recent content in Planning on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Start a Social Media Marketing Plan – why social media?
item.description: Do you really need a Social Media Marketing Plan? And if your business needs a plan - why does it have to be social media?

item.title: Start a Social Media Marketing Plan – don’t leave it to the PR person
item.description: Social Media marketing - using Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Foursquare, Google+ - needs to form part of any marketing plan across the marketing mix.
